Activity: Start the day with a quick check of emails and respond to any urgent inquiries.
Send the formal communication outlining the hospital's requirements for influenza data collection to the EHR vendor (@EHRVendor). Request confirmation of receipt and expected response time.

Document the project plan in a shared document repository accessible to all relevant stakeholders. Communicate the plan to the team and solicit feedback.

Prepare for a meeting with @DA-1, @DA-2 (Data Analysts) to discuss the data analysis requirements for influenza trends. Understand their needs for data extraction, transformation, and reporting.
